from: Description Get ready for the season with the Callier Overshirt, our new hopsack shirt. This is a heritage fabric for us at Farah, so you may recognize it from it's use across our archive through to our modern collections. The shirt features a clean, straight hem and a partially concealed button placket for a streamlined look. The sleeves have a wide, slightly blouson shape with a single pleat for a relaxed fit and feel. Long Sleeve Partially Concealed Button Placket Straight Hem Embroidered Gold F Fit Relaxed Fit Designed With A Looser Fit To Offer A Perfect Layering Option. Composition And Care 100% Cotton Archive Inspired Hopsack Facrication Machine Wash
